VivaChek Ino Sync Blood Glucose Monitoring System
VivaChek Ino Sound Blood Glucose Monitoring System
VivaChek Ino Plus Blood Glucose Monitoring System

VivaChek Ino Sound Bright Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): VivaChek Ino Smart Blood Glucose Meter (VGM04)
VivaChek Ino Sync Blood Glucose Meter (VGM05)
VivaChek Ino Sound Blood Glucose Meter (VGM09)

VivaChek Ino Sound Bright Blood Glucose Meter (VGM27)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VivaChek Ino family of blood glucose monitoring systems using amperometric biosensor technology for home diabetes management
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose concentration in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips by persons with diabetes at home to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control; not intended for neonatal use or diabetes diagnosis or screening; in vitro diagnostic use for single-person self-testing
